text: Ya halitta ku daga rai guda, sa'an nan Ya sanya ma'auranta daga gare shi. Kuma ya saukar muku daga dabbobin gida nau'i takwas Yana halitta ku a cikin cikunnan uwayenku, halitta a bayan wata halitta, a cikin duffai uku. Wannan shi ne Allah Ubangijin ku. Mulki a gare shi yake. Babu abin bautawa face Shi. To, yaya ake karkatar da ku
